{"id":1001421884,"question_id":2881,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"10 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1690079834,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1001421884/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Split Strings by Separator","memory":"44.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public List<String> splitWordsBySeparator(List<String> words, char ch) {\n        List<String> res = new ArrayList<>();\n        \n        for(String w : words){\n            \n            String str = ch + \"\";\n            if(ch=='.')\n                str = \"\\\\.\";\n            \n             if(ch=='|')\n                str = \"\\\\|\";\n            \n             if(ch=='$')\n                str = \"\\\\$\";\n                \n                \n            String[] arr = w.split(str);\n            for(String a : arr){\n                if(a.equals(\"\"))\n                    continue;\n                \n                res.add(a);\n                \n            }\n            \n          \n            \n        }\n        \n          return res;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"split-strings-by-separator","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
